description: Returns the TCG x86 default CRTM PCRs
name: CRTM x86

description: Returns the TCG x86 default SRTM PCRs
name: SRTM x86

description: Returns the TCG x86 default full UEFI SRTM PCRs. Note if IMA is running then PCR 10 (by IMA default) may be further extended to!
name: SRTM UEFI x86

description: Returns the TCG x86 default UEFI SRTM extended PCRs
name: SRTM UEFI ext x86

description: Returns the TCG x86 default SRTM Bootloader PCRs
name: SRTM Bootloader x86

description: Returns the Intel TXT default DRTM PCRs
name: DRTM TXT x86

description: Returns the Linux Integrity Measurement Architecture default PCR
name: IMA Default

description: Obtains the UEFI Eventlog from securityfs
name: UEFI Eventlog

description: Obtain the Intel TXT Txt-stat log
name: TXT-Stat

description: Obtain the Intel TXT ACM info
name: TXT ACM Info

description: NOTPM Test null claim - this returns a test value for debugging purposes only
name: NOTPM

description: Obtains system information (uname -a on Linux, systeminfo on Windows)
name: SystemInfo
